test.name: Playwright: Open a browser in headless mode

kw.name: New Page
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://robotsparebinindustries.com
No browser and context was open. New browser and context was automatically opened when page is created.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Type Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Types the text 'maria' in the given field.

kw.name: Type Secret
kw.doc: Types the given secret from ``variable_name`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Direct assignment of values as 'secret' is deprecated. Use special variable syntax to resolve variable. Example $var instead of ${var}.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

errors.msg: Direct assignment of values as 'secret' is deprecated. Use special variable syntax to resolve variable. Example $var instead of ${var}.
